name: Tiny 8x8 Dungeon Asset Pack
description:
A small collection of tiles for a simple dungeon platformer game.

I've been getting better at pixel art and decided to work on this just for fun.  It should be pretty easy to expand on this asset pack if you have suggestions for things to add. 

Feel free to use it for any of your personal projects if interested.

Project Timelapse - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K-CRJNq3JYs
